attributes.action: Allow the use of magenta coloured lights on roadside breakdown vehicles for safety of driver and general public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To distiguish between road working (repair)vehicles that have Amber beacons,crash cushions etc and the lane closed with warning signage in place for safety,whereas emergency vehicles have the unmistakeable blue light which always alerts drivers to danger.Fire engines have red & blue,Doctors green
Roadside breakdown & recovery use at the moment flashing amber lights the same as for instance a roadside repair vehicle and no road warning signs,and no lane closures.This could be potentially dangerous for all road users.
Magenta warning lights on roadside breakdown/recovery vehicles would visually advise road users of an imminent danger ahead, usually a broken down vehicle on hard shoulder.
